snippet.title: Holdfast: Nations At War - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Urrah for the Tsar! Sound the marching drums of battle as Holdfast: Nations At War sees its release out of Early Access with the ever so glorious introduction of the mighty Russian Empire.
- Steam Store (Available Now): https://store.steampowered.com/app/589290

- Join the Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/holdfastgame

- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/holdfastgame

- Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/holdfastgame

- Visit the Website: https://www.holdfastgame.com
